entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
